actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit the voluntary withholding of income taxes from certain payments under employer wage continuation plans.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit the voluntary withholding of income taxes from sick pay under employer wage continuation plans.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit the voluntary withholding of income taxes from certain payments under employer wage continuation plans.
